subject: Re: Oh my... her voice on my modified 12-470?
author: overunder21
full_text:
I almost don't want to say what I think I hear...it sent shivers down 
my spine.  Before a female voice there is a clear male voice that 
sounds like it says "GET OUT"

Followed by that is what sounds like a female voice, much softer, 
saying "sprits [something] us"  The something sounds rather 
disturbing...which is why I don't want to say it without a cleaner 
version of the audio.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> I have shown you what I did with my three modified 12-469 radios, 
in my 
> videos I have shared on the web.  As of yesterday morning I had not 
> tried my modified (older version) 12-470 yet. Well, I took it to 
our 
> local city cemetery yesterday afternoon to see what I could get. I 
> visited gravesites of people I knew had died tragically and 
quickly.  
> They say those spirits never had a chance to express prior to being 
> taken, it was just too fast.
> Anyway, I just downloaded the third file and listened.  Oh my.... 
it 
> gave me chills when I heard her voice at the last second of the 
> recording.  Am I hearing what I think I am hearing?  Can someone 
> confirm what is being said? (It is the last voice, I think saying 
three 
> words just before I turned the 12-470 off.
> I've placed the file in the folder UFO Geek Files in the file 
section. 
> It's named leah_ann_3.wav
> Thanks!
> - Mike
>
